statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (3,-8) and (7,7).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{7}-{\left(-{8}\right)}}}{{{7}-{\left({3}\right)}}}=\frac{{15}}{{4}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{15}}{{4}} (if it's not already reduced)
